title: The valevv of true valour, or, The probation and approbation of a right military man Discouered in a sermon preached Iuly 25. before the worthy gentlemen of the military company. By Thomas Taylor Doctor of Divinitie, and pastor of St. Mary Aldermanbury, London.
author: Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.
publisher: Printed by Aug: Mathewes for Tho: Iones, and are to be sold at his Shop in St. Dunstanes Churchyard,
